targets.expr:
avg_over_time(label_replace(
    label_replace(
        100 - avg(node_filesystem_avail_bytes{instance=~"(scaler|automation|designer).*:9100", instanceName=~"$qmsCustomer-(?i:($qmsEnvironment)).*", fstype="cifs"} * 100 / node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance=~"(scaler|automation|designer).*:9100", instanceName=~"$qmsCustomer-(?i:($qmsEnvironment)).*", fstype="cifs"}) by (device, instanceName),
        "share", "$2", "device", "//(.*)/(.*)"
    ),
  "environment", "$1", "instanceName", "^[^-]*-(.*)"
)[$__range:$__interval])

avg_over_time(label_replace(
    label_replace(
        100 - avg(node_filesystem_avail_bytes{instance=~"(scaler|automation|designer).*:9100", instanceName=~"$qmsCustomer-(?i:($qmsEnvironment)).*", fstype="nfs"} * 100 / node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance=~"(scaler|automation|designer).*:9100", instanceName=~"$qmsCustomer-(?i:($qmsEnvironment)).*", fstype="nfs"}) by (device, instanceName),
        "share", "$2", "device", ".*/(.*)/(.*)"
    ),
  "environment", "$1", "instanceName", "^[^-]*-(.*)"
)[$__range:$__interval])
